fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 24.90 points or 0.14% to settle at 17,624.05. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, jumped 4.02% to 12.27. Tata Motors, ICICI Bank and Reliance Industries (RIL) were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
